about_the_game:
Step into the crumbling remains of TradieCraft in tool trials, a rogue-lite platformer that fuses fitness with fast-paced gameplay. You play as a former apprentice, summoned back to the abandoned TradieCraft headquarters by an old, quirky robot named TR-Dee. TradieCraft, once a powerhouse of secret technologies, has been closed for years. But now, a rival company has kidnapped Smart Alex—a robot with access to vital trade secrets—and it's up to you to stop them before they uncover everything.

 

The deserted building is a maze of forgotten corridors, faded memories of innovation, and old tools. Each room holds physical and mental challenges that test your endurance, reflexes, and problem-solving skills. The eerie silence and abandoned environment create a haunting atmosphere as you navigate obstacle courses designed to push your limits.

 

There are no NPCs here to help you. Only TR-Dee, left plugged in for years, remembers you from your apprenticeship days and offers cryptic guidance. Your goal is simple but daunting: navigate the building, overcome the challenges, and find Smart Alex before it's too late.

 

With each run through the building, you'll gather clues, unlock abilities, and improve your fitness in real life as you push yourself to outpace traps and obstacles. The faster you complete the levels, the greater the rewards—gold and glory for those quick enough to master the platforming elements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2 & 3 , Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: a fast Usb connection will lead to better results
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2 & 3 , Valve Index
  • Additional Notes: USB 3.0 with cable that can support full data speed

short_description: TradieCraft: The Tool Trials blends a rogue-lite structure with fitness-focused gameplay, ensuring every run is a test of both skill and stamina. Can you rescue Smart Alex before the secrets of TradieCraft are revealed to the world? Only the strongest and quickest will prevail.
